>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/staking/rewards/claim_history"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Returns a list of reward claim history by core address within a given round range. Limited to 100 rounds on each query.
